articles.title: India’s budget needs to address three medium-to-long term priorities
articles.description: Employment incentive schemes in 10 labour-intensive sectors should be launched, even as public investment is enlarged in fresh-water supply and cutting-edge technologies. articles.title: World Bank Pledges $12 Million to Aid Earthquake-Struck Vanuatu
articles.description: The World Bank announced a $12 million aid package for Vanuatu following a devastating 7.3 magnitude earthquake that killed 14 people and caused widespread destruction. The funding aims to support recovery efforts, create jobs, and provide essential services to those affected. Significant damage was reported in Port Vila.
